SELECT u.nickname, u.userId, b.boardCode, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, DATE_FORMAT(b.boardWritedate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS boardWritedate, b.boardViews,b.boardType FROM boardtbl b JOIN usertbl u on b.userCode=u.userCode WHERE u.userId=#{userId} AND b.boardType IN (1,2,3,4,5) ORDER BY b.boardWritedate desc
